Title: Opening Wounds
Description:
My hunters were the ones who found Arzal'kal. They said he helped them fight off several Legion ambushes.

During our endless vigil on Argus, we had seen nothing like it. He was not as powerful as some demons, but he was persistent.

He said he wished to speak with Velen and knew that we had been in contact with him. So, I have fulfilled his request.

If Velen is all he claims to be, then he would not turn away even the least worthy of his people.

We will see. I expect little.
ObjectivesText: Speak to Arzal'kal and listen to what he has to say.
